query:
CREATE TABLE emailCampaigns (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  templateId INT,
  subject VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  body TEXT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('draft', 'sending', 'completed', 'paused') DEFAULT 'draft' NOT NULL,
  totalRecipients INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  sentCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  failedCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  createdBy INT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  completedAt TIMESTAMP NULL
);

CREATE TABLE emailQueue (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaignId INT NOT NULL,
  leadId INT NOT NULL,
  subject VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  body TEXT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'sending', 'sent', 'failed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  errorMessage TEXT,
  scheduledAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  sentAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
